com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCExtendedCellModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCBaseCellModifier
      • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCExtendedCellModifier

  • public abstract class YRCExtendedCellModifier
extends YRCBaseCellModifier
    Cell modifier class for an extended table. A cell modifier provides the capability for tables to have editable cells.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCBaseCellModifier

        CHECKBOX_EDITOR, COMBO_EDITOR, MODIFY_ERROR, MODIFY_OK, MODIFY_WARNING, NO_EDITOR, TEXT_EDITOR, UNKNOWN_EDITOR

    • Method Detail

      • setParentCellModifier

        public final void setParentCellModifier(IYRCCellModifier parentCellModifier)
        Method used to set the parent cell modifier for the extended table cell modifier. This method is called internally to handle operations performed by the extended cell modifier.
        IMPORTANT: This method must not be called by clients.
        Parameters:
        parentCellModifier -

                             java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Description copied from class: YRCBaseCellModifier
        Utility method to add the table cell for the table item in error. When called, then YRCBehavior.hasError() will return a true value.
        Specified by:
        addToError in class YRCBaseCellModifier
        Parameters:
        element - The element corresponding to the cell's row.
        property - The property corresponding to the cell's column.

      • update

        public final void update(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                         java.lang.String[] properties)
        Description copied from class: YRCBaseCellModifier
        Utility method to be used to update the table viewer UI programmatically. This should be called when an element has changed in the model, in order to have the viewer accurately reflect the model. This method only affects the viewer, not the model.
        Specified by:
        update in class YRCBaseCellModifier
        Parameters:
        element - Element to be updated.
        properties - The columns of the above element to be updated.

      • allowModifiedValue

        protected final int allowModifiedValue(java.lang.String property,
                                       java.lang.String value,
                                       org.w3c.dom.Element element)
        Description copied from class: YRCBaseCellModifier
        This method is used to check if the vaue modified by the user is correct. If it is OK to modify the current value, YRCBaseCellModifier.getModifiedValue(String, String, Element) is called and the entered value is formatted according to its data type. In rest of the cases no further processing is done. In case of error, the cell is set in error.
        Specified by:
        allowModifiedValue in class YRCBaseCellModifier
        Parameters:
        property - The property associated with the current table column.
        value - The modified value in the cell.
        element - The element corresponding to the current row.
        Returns:
        A value indicating the stauts of the modified value.
        See Also:
        YRCBaseCellModifier.MODIFY_OK, YRCBaseCellModifier.MODIFY_WARNING, YRCBaseCellModifier.MODIFY_ERROR

      • validateModifiedValue

        public abstract YRCValidationResponse validateModifiedValue(java.lang.String property,
                                                            java.lang.String value,
                                                            org.w3c.dom.Element element)

      • allowModify

        public abstract boolean allowModify(java.lang.String property,
                                    java.lang.String value,
                                    org.w3c.dom.Element element)
        Description copied from class: YRCBaseCellModifier
        This is called to check if it is OK to modify the current cell. If it is OK to modify the cell return true, else return false.
        Specified by:
        allowModify in class YRCBaseCellModifier
        Parameters:
        property - The property associated with the current table column.
        value - The current value in the cell.
        element - The element corresponding to the current row.
        Returns:
        Return true if the cell needs to be modified, else return false.

      • getModifiedValue

        public abstract java.lang.String getModifiedValue(java.lang.String property,
                                                  java.lang.String value,
                                                  org.w3c.dom.Element element)
        Description copied from class: YRCBaseCellModifier
        If the user has entered a correct value which is OK to modify, this method is called for further modification if required. This may be used as an opportunity to perform application specifc operations after user has entered the value.
        Specified by:
        getModifiedValue in class YRCBaseCellModifier
        Parameters:
        property - The property associated with the current table column.
        value - The modified value in the cell.
        element - The element corresponding to the current row.
        Returns:
        The value that should be updated in the table's model.

      • handleUpdate

                            boolean isModifiedByUser)
        Utility method which is invoked whenever a table row is updated.
        Override this method to handle table row updates.
        Parameters:
        element - The element being updated.
        isModifiedByUser - True if updated by the user False if updated programmatically.
